What is an important consideration when staking blocks with Verus Coin 0.4.0?

When staking blocks with Verus Coin 0.4.0, it's important to note that staking is now off by default to prevent multi-machine staking of the same coins or addresses. To enable staking, use the “-mint” parameter with **verusd**, “setgenerate true 0” with the **verus** CLI, or the staking button in the GUI. Additionally, only stake any address or wallet on one computer at a time, unless you can be absolutely sure they are in sync and on the same chain at every block.
